Leaves: Compound of 2-4 opposite pairs of leaftlets 1-6.5 cm long. With rounded tips and wedge-shaped bases.
Flowers: Yellow, up to 1.5 cm diameter with 5 petals.
FruitSeeds: Pods 10-25 cm long curved in a sickle-shape. Brownish green when mature. Opening to release shiny flattened brown seeds. Foul smell when damaged.
Habitat: Disturbed areas, roadsides, waterways, pastures, crops.
DistinguishingFeatures: Sickle-shaped downward-curving long slender seed pods.
